message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you really like the product, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $120. Can you try to meet me at $130?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $130, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. I'll offer it to you for $142.50.
I appreciate the concession, but I'm still a bit above $130. Can you try to meet me at $135?
I'm getting close to meeting you at $135, but I still need to make a profit. I'll offer it to you for $139.50.
I'm still a bit above $130, and I'm not willing to go above $135. Can you meet me at $135?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $140, but I'm willing to meet you at that price. I'll offer it to you for $140.
I'm not willing to go above $135. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price. Can you meet me at $135?
